about_the_game:
Chaos Chain

The Supporter Pack DLC is for people who'd like to show their extra support for Chaos Chain and Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow and do what we do while also giving you an edge in the game by rewarding your character with some extra starting gear to give them a head start into their adventure. These items are rewarded as a "thank you" to owners of The Supporter Pack DLC. Thank you to everyone who purchases this for your extra support and contribution. You've gone above and beyond!

Exclusives:
  • "Supporter" - Exclusive title for your character to be known as that can be accessed through the PDA item in the inventory!
  • 1x Extra Skill Point - Knowledge goes a long way in the sprawl. Get ahead of the curve with 1 free skill point!
      Extras:
      • 2x Soda - A can of your favorite soda to keep your thirst quenched!
      • 2x Junk Food - Some snack food so you won't starve!
      • 2x Bandage - Patch yourself up and stop your bleeding with an extra bandage!
      • 1x Rucksack - A very large pack to carry your equipment around in!
      • 1x Memory Chip - An extra memory chip which allows you to save the game anytime and anywhere you wish!
      • 25x Cred - Cred is the currency in Chaos Chain, needed for just about anything and everything!
      PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE TWO WAYS TO ACTIVATE THIS DLC IN GAME. YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
      ---
      • 1 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *NEW* CHARACTER, JUST CREATE YOUR CHARACTER AND THE DLC WILL AUTOMATICALLY ACTIVATE AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!
      • 2 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *SAVED* CHARACTER, YOU MUST USE THE PDA ITEM IN YOUR INVENTORY AND SELECT "ACTIVATE DLC".
      • AFTER - THEY CAN THEN BE FOUND IN YOUR STORAGE STASH! YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH!
